JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you an expert Category Manager that always strives for continuous improvement? Then you might be the one we are looking for!
Global Strategic Procurement is on an exciting journey. Our ambition is to support Polytechs strategic targets as a motivator for growth, through robust supply and improved profit.


Work for a united purpose at a company where Sustainability and Green energy is our target.

As our new colleague, one of your main responsibilities will be to build and implement the Global sourcing strategy. Furthermore, we expect your tasks to include:
• Actively work to secure procurement involvement in sourcing activities and ensure high quality and on-time delivery for the right prices and under the optimal conditions
• Manage supplier relationships – including supplier segmentation and strategy development and execution of planned activities
• Handle new items and materials qualification
• Cooperate with Polytech’s other departments and subsidiaries to further develop and optimize our commerce with the suppliers
• Envision, develop, and execute global category strategies based on supplier market insights, advanced data analytics, internal and external trends, and collaboration with colleagues and stakeholders
To succeed in this position, you will cooperate with a variety of partners in the organization such as Operations, R&D, Quality and Planning.
 
The preferred candidate
We expect that you have a Business or Procurement/Supply Chain bachelor's degree or equivalent background. Other requirements are:
- A proven track record as Category Manager with 5-10 years of confirmed proficiencies within the direct material category
- Experience in delivering competitive advantage to the business through the implementation of global sourcing strategies
- Able to lead negotiations and support projects with cross-functional teams and subsidiaries
- Excellent in interpersonal skills and a positive relationship builder
- Fluent in English both oral and in writing

Combined with being dedicated, dynamic, and results-based, you hold strong stakeholder management skills and are an experienced negotiator.


Apply and become part of the Polytech family:
Please send us your CV by using the apply button. Cvs are reviewed continuously.
For further information about this position, you are welcome to contact our Global Procurement Manger Lars K. Sommer, lks@polytech.com or +45 41998260
